price: 难道他们不知道吗？谁违抗安拉及其使者，谁将受火狱的刑罚，并永居其中。那是重大的凌辱。
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخِزۡيُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū annahu man yuḥādidi al-laha warasūlahu fa-anna lahu nāra jahannama khālidan fīhā dhālika al-khiz'yu al-ʿaẓīmu
